original_title: Chief Inspector of police killed in Homagama accident
original_body_lines: A chief police inspector attached to the  Homagama Special Crimes Investigation Division, died after a motorcycle he was riding collided with a bus at Makumbura in Homagama on the Colombo - Avissawella Road.
Police said the deceased is a 47-year-old resident of Panadura.
His body has been handed over to relatives after the post-mortem and autopsy.
The driver of the bus involved in the accident has been arrested, and the Homagama police are conducting further investigations.
